Detailed Description

The class describes a X509CertificatePath , it inherit the base class CeritificatePath, we can use it constractor a object. 

 //Assume that we have several X509Certificate file path "test1.crt","test2.crt".

 CertificatePath* pCertPath = new X509CertificatePath();

 gaia::base String path1 = "test1.crt";
 gaia::base String path2 = "test2.crt";

 Certificate* pCert1 = new X509Certificate(path1);
 Certificate* pCert2 = new X509Certificate(path2);

 bool bRet = pCertPath->addCertificate(pCert1);
 bool bRet = pCertPath->addCertificate(pCert2);

 int iRet = pCertPath->validate();
 int iRet = pCertPath->getLength();
 Certificate *pCert = pCertPath->getTrustAnchor();

 //free Certificate
 delete pCert1;
 delete pCert2;
 //free CertificatePath
 delete pCertPath;
